WorkItem.ClosedComment: This item has been fixed for the next release.
WorkItem.Description: I'm not sure how to describe this, but when you change to Moonkin the items in the right hand pane have no values for sustained/burst etc.

Comments.Message: Seems to me base values aren't being loaded, all statistics are 0 and rawr cant weight item, talent or buff values because of that.
I'm aware of it, but it shouldn't really matter anyway.  The module works just fine with a character loaded (and yes, base values are being loaded).

Sadly loading characters from bnet ain't working properly at the moment so I can't load my character. Without this I can't fill out a character from scratch either so its kidna unusable. Any chance you can post a blank moonkin character file we can open or something?
Well, I fixed it anyway.  I'll see if I can get Astrylian to push up a new version soon.
Cheers mate. And thanks alot for the superb work :)
